title: Personal portfolio and blog app
desc: My portfolio, which is the website that you are seeing here :), that was created from scratch. I'm planning to make this thing a blog platform so I can share stuff I want to write

title: Competitive Programming Club's website
desc: This is the website of University of Adelaide's Competitive Programming Club. I have maintained it, and optimized the code base so it's easier to understand

title: Freight Frenzy scoring app
desc: An Android app that helps calculating score for the FIRST Tech Challenge robotic competition. Students can also register team, or sharing score, etc.

title: Medbuddy mobile app
desc: A software solution that was built during UniHack 2022 hackathon, as a companion to solve medical-related problems. There was a web and mobile version of the solution, and I was responsible for the Android app

title: Nand2Tetris computer system
desc: A simple computer system with necessary hardware (developed in HDL) and software (developed in Python), built during the Nand2Tetris course
